content: coffee n crochet 1 rustic sunflower square us rustic sunflower square copyright you need this pattern is for personal use only ♥ yarn of your own choice please do not repost the pattern itself on ♥ hook that matches the yarn another site in an online forum or give ♥ scissors away copies if you wish to share this ♥ needle large pattern please share this link to the pattern instead general information https //www ravelry com/patterns/library terms us /rustic-sunflower-square abbreviations you may not publish a pattern using this slip_stitch = slip_stitch square as a component chain = chain don t modify my photos or use my photo single_crochet = single_crochet to promote yourself half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet please don t translate my patterns to double_crochet = double_crochet other languages or make video tutorials treble_crochet = treble without my written consent chain-space = chain space selling 2dc-cluster = 2 double_crochet cluster any products you make from my patterns pet = petal are yours and you may of course sell the example x3 = work the instructions product of your work inside the - as many times as the a link back to my blog or the pattern number after the x would be much appreciated ©camilla n skjønhaug coffeencrochet com post@coffeencrochet com for private use only do not copy or resell the pattern instagram @coffeencrochet coffee n crochet 2 rustic sunflower square us social media feel free to follow coffee n crochet on social media for updates special offers and free patterns instagram @coffeencrochet / https //www instagram com/coffeencrochet/ facebook coffee n crochet / https //www facebook com/coffeencrochet/ website coffee n crochet / https //www coffeencrochet com/ facebook group coffee n crochet / https //www facebook com/groups/2127189980860398/ tiktok @coffeencrochet com / https //www tiktok com/@coffeencrochet com i would also love to see your pictures of this project please share your pictures on instagram using the hashtag #rusticsunflowersquare and #coffeencrochetdesign or on facebook s pecial stitches 2 double_crochet cluster 1 yarn over and insert hook into stitch yarn over and draw through the stitch 2 yarn over and draw through the first two loops on your crochet hook you now have two loops on your crochet hook 3 yarn over and insert hook into the same stitch yarn over and draw through the stitch 4 yarn over and draw through the first two loops on your crochet hook you should now have three loops on your crochet hook 5 yarn over and draw through the three remaining loops on your crochet hook chain 1 petal ch1-pet chain 3 petal ch3-pet 2dc-cluster ch1 2dc-cluster in the same stitch 2dc-cluster ch3 2dc-cluster in the same stitch ©camilla n skjønhaug coffeencrochet com post@coffeencrochet com for private use only do not copy or resell the pattern instagram @coffeencrochet coffee n crochet 3 rustic sunflower square us rustic sunflower square 5 1 slip_stitch in between the 3rd and the 4th double_crochet of the petal ch1 = 1 single_crochet ch2 ch1-pet in the 3rd loop the one that
